column2: A magazine of 17 silver bullets, it is rumored to have come from the moon. Not compatible with magical wands.
A magazine of 17 oversized silver bullets, it is rumored to have come from the moon. Not compatible with magical wands.
A magazine of 18 rose bullets, they will fire in bursts of 3 and seek out your foes. Not compatible with magical wands.
A magazine of 18 oversized rose bullets, they will explode into a flurry of petals. Not compatible with magical wands.
A magazine of 6 bloody bullets, they will drain the vitality of those they strike. Not compatible with magical wands.
A magazine of 6 oversized bloody bullets, your last shot will cause bloody spikes to erupt from the ground. Not compatible with magical wands.
